articles.title: CSX's chief financial officer leaves
articles.description: CSX Corp. said late Tuesday Chief Financial Officer Frank A. Lonegro, a 19-year veteran with the railway company, has departed.

articles.title: CSX Corp: A Great Business At Multi Year Lows
articles.description: Despite some concerns about a slowdown in the U.S. and global economies, I think now would be a good time to buy CSX Corp.
